description: This file defines a React functional component 'Login' representing a login page that manages user authentication, handles form submission, and interacts with authentication context and React Router for navigation.

methods.name: Login()
methods.description: React functional component for the login page, handles user input, form submission, and navigation after login.

methods.name: handleChange
methods.description: Updates form state when user types into email or password fields.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission, calls login, handles errors, and redirects user.
